div.h4: Tannehill Public Schools Meal Delivery Service
div.p:
Tannehill Public Schools will be providing meal service to our students while classes and campuses are shut down. We will be serving lunch and a breakfast for the next day from 11:00 am to 12:30 pm. You can come by and pick up your meal or you can arrange delivery to your home, or pickup at our Mitchell Road bus stop. You can be added at any time by calling Tannehill Schools at 918-423-6393
It's A Great Day To Be A Brave!!!

span.span: Tannehill has a long-standing tradition of giving the graduating 8th grade class personalized letter jackets. Recently, school Principal Jon Booth, presented the 2019-2020 graduating class their 8th grade letter jackets.

div.button:
Dense Fog Advisory
Click for more Information

div.p: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT MONDAY... ...Visibility 1/4 mile or less in dense fog. ...In Oklahoma, Muskogee, McIntosh, Sequoyah, Pittsburg, Haskell, Latimer and Le Flore Counties. In Arkansas, Crawford, Franklin and Sebastian Counties. ...Until 10 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Visibilities are expected to be reduced to less than one quarter mile by the dense fog, creating hazardous driving conditions.
